item.title: Separate Ecto From Phoenix In Umbrella App

item.title: Ecto Callbacks Macro
item.description: Ecto callbacks (before/after) commit hooks have been deprecated, for a general good reason. Using callbacks is generally bad and you should never do it. But sometimes you need to do it because real life. I wrote this macro this afternoon that implements both atomic and non-atomic callbacks. Here it is in all its glory. I won’t make it a hex package because it’s probably a bad thing to do.
